General.Name: Clinica Baviera
General.Description: Clínica Baviera, S.A., a medical company, operates a network of ophthalmology clinics. The company is involved in the diagnosis, treatment, and monitoring of various types of visual disorders. Its clinics offers myopia, hyperopia, astigmatism, presbyopia, cataract, retina, pediatric ophthalmology, glaucoma, squint, cornea, neuroftalmología, and vías lagrimales treatments. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.
General.Address: Paseo de la Castellana 20, Madrid, Spain, 28046
